# Transformer

**Associated Type**

The transformer type created by this estimator.

## Declaration

```swift
associatedtype Transformer : TemporalTransformer
```

## Adapting and fitting

- **adaptedAsSupervised(annotationType:)**: Exposes this temporal estimator as a supervised temporal estimator.
- **fitted(to:)**
- **fitted(to:eventHandler:)**: Fits a transformer to a sequence of examples.

items.description: Exposes this temporal estimator as a supervised temporal estimator.
items.name: adaptedAsSupervised(annotationType:)

items.description: Fits a transformer to a sequence of examples.
